info.name: Urb-it Delivery API - Examples
info.description:
# Delivery API v4 postman collection

## Authorization and API key

This collection set both `Authorization` and `x-api-key` headers for all it's requests. No need to set them for each request.

## Necessary global environment variables

* `X-Api-Key`
* `Authorization` (including leading `Bearer`)

exec: throw new Error("MISSING CountryCode IN ENV");
throw new Error("MISSING ClientId IN ENV");
